籤詩版本二:
Contains priceless treasures and treasures
Why do you need to look for jade outside?
It’s better to wait for someone to know
Be more generous and more generous
詩意: This hexagram hides the image found in jade. Everything can be done in due time.
解曰: Contains gold and jade. Don't know what to look for. Encounter your guidance. No need to worry.
籤詩故事一:
◇Bite gold and hire benevolence
Cheng Yaojin was the founding father of the Tang Dynasty. One day, Rengui was taking a nap in the mountains. Suddenly he found Yaojin being chased by a tiger as he passed by. Rengui caught up with him, injured the tiger, and saved Yaojin.
Yaojin admired Rengui's martial arts, gave him a Jinling arrow, and asked him to join the army.
Xue Rengui later became a general of the Tang Dynasty.
聖意:
Home and house pray for protection.
Peace of mind.
Seeking wealth and waiting.
Transaction late.
Marriage Just.
Rokko Male.
Pedestrians block.
Field silkworm: half cooked.


The six animals are prosperous.
Looking for people to work.
The lawsuit is put on hold.
Migration is lucky.
Lost property North.
Disease: Meet a good doctor.
The mountain tomb should be changed.
